hiveArticle.title: 🍞 Central Market Hall Budapest 🍞 布達佩斯中央市場 🍞  #myeuropaplog series  歐洲行旅照片記錄系列
hiveArticle.body:
https://steemitimages.com/DQmSCCzP6GUYoQYwJHybeXZwMTY6P89r5Sc4jgtMeshryJa/DSC_1550.JPG

The Great Market Hall or Central Market Hall (Hungarian "Nagyvásárcsarnok") is the largest and oldest indoor market in Budapest, Hungary.  The market offers a huge variety of stalls. As tourists, it seems inevitable to pay this place a visit. So we did. But.... probably won't in the future... you will see in a bit. Still, I will recommend you to come here and have a look. Just don't.... :)

布達佩斯中央市場歷史悠久... 幾乎所有旅遊書都會寫到它。我們原本時間不多，但離飯店近，還是來看看，順便想買買紀念品。雖然，去過之後，結論是以後不再來了(詳後)，但如果你來這裡，我覺得還是可以來看看，只是要注意不要.... :)

https://steemitimages.com/DQmecf9r48T2PDXy2xNax7JvfqPHmLsxoPwbSq77oUNLJUe/DSC_1548.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmNzHa6i4jkX2Xks1JQaqzLe5w5rMaNBLoBjcAXErK2LsD/DSC_1523.JPG

Look around, it is very interesting to see what those stalls are selling... yes, from these stalls you can get some clue about how the lives here are like. I've always love browsing markets. 

四處看看，什麼都有，市場嘛，就是當地人生活的縮影。蔬菜、水果、魚跟肉、起司麵包，辣椒（對！匈牙利到處是紅辣椒，是名產，但不太辣的）與各種用品等... 生意蠻好的.... 

https://steemitimages.com/DQmS12reagmydaES7toU6Sh4N5AQ4DESaXGhwginvMQ1iGj/DSC_1540.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmSxNNyGfBCQcJxQLFNwrRCMGstxAmkg7iPDXgkV9qixvK/1DSC_1521.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmd5nqv3HtiMCWkXk8umFzYyugsLp4WbiWMghGM6xVPVm3/1DSC_1524.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmU9UMRWSJB5uR6ihorrrAC1QuSbMmjh1nbjf34zjxeP39/1DSC_1529.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmdrwgMx5YipT1gxHy7tsUhfwMFQxFY68vkrpsEyga88eH/1DSC_1525.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmVNNJKQ8KiPmBnLN5vhkqL9ZWbzGfMhwXobJKCTXE188s/1DSC_1522.JPG

Famous Hungarian Pepper - Paprika!!

這就是匈牙利辣椒專賣店了，紅椒粉 Paprika 是名產，但不太辣的

https://steemitimages.com/DQmYxxsGdVm3GwR4jjosV5twDBG49LFVBoJ27oLGWpW2SSY/1DSC_1528.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmZD2qEt17byE1YjQkg7kK23eBv99ALuyV299BKHPLohg3/1DSC_1534.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmVwtPfkVNiL62jK4G7JT3MS4CytomDqW2EVEW2nuMexZ6/1DSC_1535.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmYSWPm79jXaNAH5A67RocKGEuZrVMKEWTc5xPtp1DQzFc/1DSC_1530.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmQVxvZfEnJxViDuJEKd614oczRLF8ar1bUkBnxHHqJFoR/DSC_1531.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmbMUvA6bUdnikBioZRK94Nxn2bxaPaCJ4APMwWvZGxFpD/DSC_1527.JPG

Hungarian Wine is famous. It sells not only Tokaji here... 

匈牙利一個超有名的產品就是甜白酒 (Tokaji) ，可以買來送人。但我不太喝甜的酒就是了...

https://steemitimages.com/DQmexUFnoVkjxDEaARQAkMfL1cyqWeiXSGiGJk5STrj7iw9/1DSC_1537.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQme9z9ohCvRXK9ruggcoc3rrPrU2GBNKA26qmmh3TB6KHq/DSC_1538.JPG

Some handmade wood utensils. Pretty good. We bought some too! :) 

這些木製品很精緻，價錢也合理。我們也買了一些。

https://steemitimages.com/DQmU3rY9JBr2rhasPEuUTjgmb2Ka999JxDD6YkBNShkeQwK/DSC_1526.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmRHVpSxvNE57zcawR33xJxvTeeB2L8spFBfo7GJ9wdssG/DSC_1532.JPG

It has 2nd floor, selling some souvenirs, clothes and there are also some local food stalls... Let's have a look. 

二樓賣些紀念品、衣服以及當地的小吃店與酒吧等，上樓看看吧！視野很好。

https://steemitimages.com/DQmXabJ5EMAABMEmqQmZHDKSBdegkU1MpHFgHDvbuY6aoQw/DSC_1541.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmNSv7EcLAUwvkyrH1hAPnNVJt8ZY3bFsd1nizr4bQ7nLT/DSC_1546.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmeDgvoDVfy3mMHKKsHjrHQGTx9GDQsVVzRAdtsofWPtPq/DSC_1542.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmS5otuo6WoaPRW4C5o758dr5FQcgHvnJcE7G6GMhMX2md/DSC_1547.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmSf2fwGkbBk1BZSEmcvrkQ1Hj8JKLLk4GSUmiYk7AarY1/DSC_1536.JPG

We had a bite at the 2nd floor and picked a stall that had empty seats and seemed alright serving local cuisines.

我們在二樓看到不少當地小吃，看得餓了，找了一家看似當地料理的店，剛好也有位置。亂點了一把。

https://steemitimages.com/DQmNojk2t7wQDGtR3fpu2EbUJPRVJ1E9VD7HqpkkoCN4iMS/DSC_1544.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmUn9DYeBrKnmx4v56hh3JbkM9YBdJMgbqoxWpv6b48uHk/DSC_1545.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmPG4JoxWXpVvMQzgK6htqhu3twHWun67yW9Ckh7Ejjgcf/DSC_1543.JPG

Turns out ... WE GOT RIPPED OFF!! Food was lousy and extremely expensive! Of course there was no prices shown!! As we were eating their food, we looked at the owner and "the gang" walking around smiling like saying "It's not my fault ... you come here means you want to be ripped off!".... Pissed!! This is the worse place in Budapest. Other places are lovely...

結果... 是個騙觀光客的爛店！忘記花了多少錢了，總之很貴！東西也難吃。布達佩斯其實不是很貴的地方，所以我們一吃那食物品質，以及算清楚花多少錢後，馬上知道被敲竹槓了！很後悔沒去另一家生意爆好但幾乎沒有位子的店。吃著這些東西，看著老闆跟"黨羽們"四處走來走去還帶著笑容，臉上似乎在說"你們來就是想被敲啊，這可不能怪我...哈哈哈~~~~" 氣死我們了！這是布達佩斯最讓我們厭惡的地方，以後不來中央市場了，根本都是騙觀光客的... 其他地方還是很棒的....

https://steemitimages.com/DQmXanSXc6CiDEckXsMfUheDtVogeF6RhGu14G4wUs5EiaX/DSC_1549.JPG

https://steemitimages.com/DQmdErf22ah1HqRRFFFf6n2BV2RFtxuzb8rcvkdVMBE8ZnM/DSC_1517.JPG

--------  Equipment used - Sony Xperia UA1 Smartphone ----------

https://steemitimages.com/DQmS5cT4bLQFfaFAgrSnjg6hPv2LEp3zsWnN5L82Hbxy4NU/image.png

Good bye central market! Probably won't see you again! 

再見了中央市場，下次我再來布達佩斯，多半不會來看你了。好好做人啊！

You may check #myeuropaplog for previous posts about my European trip. Thanks!
